medium: Watercolor and pen and ink on card
title: Peter Peter Pumpkin Eater
marks: Signature LLC, in black ink: [Richard Holzschuh]
description: young man wearing black and white striped hat with red tassel, brown jacket, green knickers, green striped stockings and blue and orange slippers seated on a stool and eating a pumpkin pie; very large pumpkin/house behind man; woman wearing white cap and blue dress seen through window in pumpkin, knitting; cat playing with yarn ball, LRC
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
